String.string: The Dog Whimperer
This jerky might help with the dogs.
I have the cutest sweaters for them, too.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:77#3002#Paruru}.
"I'll do my best."
"There's a nice doggy."
Use the smoked jerky to lure {@LinkCreature:77#3015#Sweetie} home.
